snippet: The inspector general for the Department of Health and Human Services said that the insurance exchanges under the health care law did not have adequate safeguards.
abstract: Inspector general for Health and Human Services Dept reports that independent audit of insurance exchanges established under the health care law has found that federal and state officials did not properly check the eligibility of people seeking coverage and applying for subsidies; it is latest indication of unresolved problems at HealthCare.gov.
lead_paragraph: The inspector general for the Department of Health and Human Services said that the insurance exchanges under the health care law did not have adequate safeguards.

headline.main: Eligibility for Health Insurance Was Not Properly Checked, Audit Finds
headline.print_headline: Eligibility for Health Insurance Was Not Properly Checked, Audit Finds
